scripts.start: concurrently "nodemon app.js" "cd client && yarn run start"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
